attributes.action: Act in an honest manner and stop bending the rules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Desparate measure by changing the voting rules at the last minute to help his chances of staying in power -he was never elected anyway -there wasn't a vote- he should leave now -with honour.
He bounces from 1 mistake to the next.
Time to leave-let someone else have a go!

rejection.details: The title of your petition needs to make a clear point about government policy. At the moment it does not. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
